topic.title: Checking an XML Document for Errors

body.p:
automatically checks the document for errors. The errors and warnings reported by the validation engine include problems found in the following:
The structural integrity and well-formedness of the document.
A set of best practice rules (such as a maximum number of words in a paragraph).

To see the list of errors, tap or click the Errors button (note the red marker showing the number of errors found in the document). Every item in the list has a button to its right side. Tap or click that button to go to the location in the document where the issue was found.
